name: Flag
title: Flag
description: Prospective warnings of potential issues when providing care to the patient.

elements.name: Flag
elements.description: Prospective warnings of potential issues when providing care to the patient.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: Business identifiers assigned to this flag by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

elements.name: category
elements.description: Allows a flag to be divided into different categories like clinical, administrative etc.

elements.name: code
elements.description: The coded value or textual component of the flag to display to the user.

elements.name: subject
elements.description: The patient, location, group, organization, or practitioner etc. this is about record this flag is associated with.

elements.name: period
elements.description: The period of time from the activation of the flag to inactivation of the flag.

elements.name: encounter
elements.description: This alert is only relevant during the encounter.

elements.name: author
elements.description: The person, organization or device that created the flag.
